import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useHistory, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { toAbsoluteUrl } from "../../../../../../../../../_metronic/_helpers"; import SVG from "react-inlinesvg"; import { Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CardBody } from "../../../../../../../../../_metronic/_partials/controls"; import Autocomplete from "@material-ui/lab/Autocomplete"; import { TextField } from "@material-ui/core"; import InventoryBreadCrum from '../../../../../../bread-crum/InventoryBreadCrum'; import { data } from "jquery"; export default function StockReceiveList() { let history = useHistory(); let location = useLocation(); const transactionInfo = location.state.state; const [value, setValue] = React.useState(null); const [productList, setProductList] = useState([]) const [batchList, setBatchList] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { if (location.state !== undefined) { setProductList(location.state.state.productList); } }, []) console.log(location.state.state) const handleBackToListPage = () => { history.push('/inventory/stock/stock-transfer/stock-receive'); } const handleSelectProduct = (number, data) => { // FOR SELECTED CARD BTN let id = "product-id-" + number; const getId = document.getElementById(id); const getElements = document.getElementsByClassName('order-list-div'); for (var i = 0; i < getElements.length; i++) { getElements[i].classList.remove('select-order-list'); } // FOR RADIO BTN let radioId = "product-radio-id-" + number; const getRadioId = document.getElementById(radioId); var cbs = document.getElementsByClassName("all-radio"); for (var i = 0; i < cbs.length; i++) { cbs[i].checked = false; } if (getId.className == "select-order-list") { getId.classList.remove('select-order-list'); getRadioId.checked = false; setBatchList([]) } else { getId.classList.add('select-order-list'); getRadioId.checked = true; let temp = [...productList] let index = temp.findIndex((obj) => obj.id === data.id); // setBatchList(temp[index].batch); setBatchList(temp[index].batchList); } } const batchSelected = () => { let temp = [...batchList] temp.push({ "batchId": 1, "batchName": "000113-000005-24-05-2021", "batchQty": 456, "excessQty": 0, "shortQty": 0, "damageQty": 0, "confirm": false }, { "batchId": 2, "batchName": "000113-000005-24-05-2022", "batchQty": 456, "excessQty": 0, "shortQty": 0, "damageQty": 0, "confirm": false }, { "batchId": 3, "batchName": "000113-000005-24-05-2023", "batchQty": 456, "excessQty": 0, "shortQty": 0, "damageQty": 0, "confirm": false }) setBatchList(temp) } const handleReceivedChange = (product) => { document.getElementById('receive').classList.add('d-none') document.getElementById('received').classList.remove('d-none') } return ( <> {/* BREAD CRUM ROW */}
{/* HEADER ROW */}
{/* BACK AND TITLE ROW */}
Stock Receive Request
{/* FROM TO AND ADDITIONAL INFO ROW */}
{/* FROM ROW */}
From
Depot
{transactionInfo.depot_name}
{/* AADDITIONAL INFO ROW */}
Store Info
{/* TO ROW */}
To
Depot
{transactionInfo.to_depot_name}
{/* SEARCH OR QR SCAN ROW */}
{/* PRODUCTION RECEIVE TITLE ROW */}
Title
Product Receive
PRODUCTS INFO
Title
Batch Receive
BATCH INFO
Title
Receive Action
ACTION
{/* PRODUCTION RECEIVE LIST DATA */}
{/* PRODUCTS ROW */}
{ productList.map((product, index) => (
handleSelectProduct(index, product)} id={"product-id-" + index}>
{product.product_sku}
{product.p_name}
{product.category_name}
)) }
{/* BATCHES ROW */}
{batchList.map((batch, index) => ( <>
{index + 1}
QTY.
{batch.quantity} Batch
{batch.batch_no}
))}
{/* NOTES ROW */}
